mockData.assetDescription: A comprehensive and accurate translation of the Holy Quran in English, prepared by a team of specialists in Islamic studies and Arabic language. This translation includes brief interpretations and explanatory notes to help the reader understand the meanings better.
mockData.assetContentPreview: As shown in the attached screenshot with the text that represents an aspect of the content that will be viewed in full within the file after obtaining access permission downloaded

licenseContent.section1Content: Under this license, the user is granted the right to use the resource according to the specified terms. The user must respect the copyright and authorship rights of the original publisher of the resource.
licenseContent.term1: • Original source must be cited when using
licenseContent.term2: • Content modification is not allowed without explicit permission
licenseContent.term3: • Commercial use requires additional approval from the publisher
licenseContent.violation: Violation of these terms may result in license cancellation and appropriate legal action.
licenseContent.section2Content: The user bears full responsibility for the proper use of the resource in accordance with Islamic law and applicable laws.
licenseContent.responsibility1: • Ensuring accurate use and avoiding distortion
licenseContent.responsibility2: • Not using the resource for purposes contrary to Islamic law
licenseContent.responsibility3: • Maintaining the integrity and quality of the content
licenseContent.obligation1: • Report any errors or issues with the resource to the publisher
licenseContent.obligation2: • Respect the rights of authors and translators
licenseContent.obligation3: • Do not redistribute the resource without permission
licenseContent.section3Content: The publisher makes every effort to ensure the accuracy and quality of the content, but does not guarantee that the resource is error-free or uninterrupted.
licenseContent.dispute1: • Disputes are resolved according to Islamic law
licenseContent.dispute2: • Competent courts in the country where the publisher resides have jurisdiction
licenseContent.dispute3: • Amicable arbitration is preferred before resorting to litigation
licenseContent.section4Content: By agreeing to these terms, the user confirms their understanding and commitment to all the above provisions. This agreement governs the use of the resource and defines the rights and obligations of all parties.
